abstract: Michiko Kakutani An Appraisal column on author and neurologist Oliver Sacks, who has died at age 82; praises way Sacks used case studies of patients to construct literary narratives that allowed readers to explore medical phenomenon, aided by his keen observations and his remarkable reservoirs of sympathy.
lead_paragraph: Whether writing about his patients, his love of chemistry or the power of music, Dr. Sacks leapfrogged among disciplines, shedding light on the connections between science and art.

headline.main: Oliver Sacks, Casting Light on the Interconnectedness of Life
headline.print_headline: Doctor Who Found Magic in the Disorders of the Human Mind

snippet: Whether writing about his patients, his love of chemistry or the power of music, Dr. Sacks leapfrogged among disciplines, shedding light on the connections between science and art.
